      • fileOpened

        public void fileOpened(FileEditorManager source,
                       VirtualFile file)
        Description copied from interface: FileEditorManagerListener
        This method is after focus settles down (if requested) in newly created FileEditor. FileEditorManagerListener.fileOpenedSync(FileEditorManager, VirtualFile, Pair) is always invoked before this method (in same or previous EDT event).
        Specified by:
        fileOpened in interface FileEditorManagerListener
        See Also:
        FileEditorManagerListener.fileOpenedSync(FileEditorManager, VirtualFile, Pair)

      • isEnabledForFile

        protected boolean isEnabledForFile(VirtualFile file)
        Parameters:
        file - result of EditorBasedWidget.getSelectedFile()
        Returns:
        false if widget should be disabled for file even if getWidgetState(VirtualFile) returned EditorBasedStatusBarPopup.WidgetState.actionEnabled.
